title: Waking The Dragon
description: With the Oval Office in the balance and winning the Presidency the big prize, Pamela Graham is thrown into an avalanche of drama accompanied by Alex and the charismatic Benjamin Graham, Pamela uncovers the unthinkable—evidence of an assassination plot—a bold move that threatens the election of the United States Presidency. But before Pamela and Alex can reach the Presidential candidate and his team, Benjamin and Alex are attacked by a deadly task force…a private team of assassins controlled by a mysterious power-broker who will stop at nothing to control the Presidential election and its outcome. Fleeing for their lives in an environment as corrupt as it is lethal, they possess only one hope - to save the Presidential candidate before its too late and to find out who is behind this masterful ploy. The truth, they will learn, is the most shocking deception of all…In her most thrilling novel to date, author Pamela Martin transports readers from the ultra-secret Bohemian Grove to the streets of Washington D.C., and back again to the hallways of power inside and outside the White House. Heralded for masterfully intermingling world politics and economics in her acclaimed thriller Hard Whispers, Martin has crafted another novel in which nothing is as it seems—and behind every corner is a stunning surprise. Waking the Dragon is heart-pounding fiction at its finest.
author: Pamela  Martin
